Pre-Game Insights: Egypt narrowly avoided a shocking loss to Mozambique in their AFCON opener, salvaging a point with a late penalty goal from Mohamed Salah.
Eintracht Frankfurt’s Omar Marmoush eyes a start, and Al Ahly’s Mohamed Abdelmonem is a yellow card away from suspension.
Ghana faced defensive issues in a 2-1 loss to Cape Verde.
The AFCON 2023 match between Egypt and Ghana will be on Thursday, 18th January 2024, 8:00 PM (GMT); Friday, 19th January 2024, 1:30 AM (IST) at Felix Houphouet Boigny Stadium.
Others: The AFCON 2023 match between Egypt and Ghana will be telecasted in India on Fancode.
You can live stream this match on Fancode App.
The live telecast of the match will be on Sky Sports in the UK.
You can watch Egypt vs Ghana live on beIN Sports in the USA.
Live streaming of this match in Nigeria will be available on NTA.
